description: Grunge-hog Steve Cannon is on a sawhorse surrounded by tools. He finds a long silver rod and decides to fuck his cock in a sensational sounding scene that ends with him nailing his cock to a board (OK-- he does it through his Prince Albert ring hole, but it is still quite dramatic). For guys into the ever-growing fetish of cock stuffing, this is a must-see scene!
title: Construction Zone 2 - Working Man's Hands, Scene #01
